video.title: Snake Salvation
video.synopsis: In the hills of Appalachia, two Pentecostal pastors struggle to keep an old tradition alive: the practice of handling deadly snakes in church.

episodes.synopsis: With winter fast approaching, Pastor Andrew Hamblin and Pastor Jamie Coots race to capture venomous snakes before the serpents go into hibernation.
episodes.title: Appalachian Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Jamie plans a risky trip to Texas to replenish his snake supply, while Andrew adds a rare specimen to his collection: an albino western rattlesnake.
episodes.title: Smoke 'em Out

episodes.synopsis: Jamie, his son and their friend Kenny are caught transporting three diamondback rattlers and two copperheads at a routine traffic stop in Tennessee.
episodes.title: Courting Disaster

episodes.synopsis: When Pastor Jamie Coots, his son Little Cody, their friend Big Cody and Pastor Andrew Hamblin go snake hunting in Louisiana, Little Cody gets bitten.
episodes.title: Swamp Hunt

episodes.synopsis: The pastors learn that local media are seeking to report about someone being bitten in Andrew's church, and Jamie believes the law has it in for them.
episodes.title: Venom in the Veins

episodes.synopsis: Andrew suspects the devil is trying to steal away his congregation. He calls for a revival, a special type of service meant to cast out evil spirits.
episodes.title: Casting Out Demons

episodes.synopsis: The foundation of Jamie's church is shaken when a copperhead bites his father, Pap-paw, who fights to recover without seeking medical attention.
episodes.title: Bitten in Church

episodes.synopsis: Pastor Jamie Coots's daughter has quit the church after divorcing her husband. Jamie and Linda worry she's vulnerable to the devil's temptations.
episodes.title: Backsliding

episodes.synopsis: Pastor Andrew Hamblin sets out to change Tennesee's snake handling laws, while Kentucky pastor Jamie Coots aims to mentor a young church member.
episodes.title: Outlaw Religion

episodes.synopsis: Andrew struggles to recruit skeptical new members to his snake handling church. Jamie and Big Cody snag an angry black rattlesnake to use in services.
episodes.title: The Devil Fights Your Mind

episodes.synopsis: Andrew gave up his dream of being a famous musician several years ago to serve God instead, but his impulse purchase of a banjo makes him reconsider.
episodes.title: Temptation of the Flesh

episodes.synopsis: As Jamie's 21-year-old daughter, Trina, distances herself from the church, Jamie aims to bring her back into the fold by taking her on a snake hunt.
episodes.title: Sin or Serpents

episodes.synopsis: Concerned about who would succeed him if he were to die of a snake bite, Jamie wants his son, Little Cody, to begin preparing to become a pastor.
episodes.title: Deadly Legacy

episodes.synopsis: Andrew returns to his roots to visit the grandparents who raised him. But his once-proud family is now troubled by his obsession with snake handling.
episodes.title: Lethal Poisoning

episodes.synopsis: Little Cody is having trouble making ends meet and gets help from Big Cody. In Tennessee, Andrew acquires a 6-foot-long rattlesnake he names Tiny.
episodes.title: Tempted by the Devil

episodes.synopsis: With the onset of fall and wild snakes hibernating, pastors Andrew Hamblin and Jamie Coots must obtain their serpents by attending a big snake expo.
episodes.title: Tricks of the Trade
